raw.title: [BIP-779] Enable Gauge for inwstETHs/WETH [Ethereum]
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
### PR with Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1763

**Summary:**
> This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for inwstETHs/WETH on Ethereum. inwstETHs represents wstETH restaked on Symbiotic, through whitelisted Mellow and Symbiotic curated vaults. InceptionLRT will delegate wstETH to curators based on governance voting decision.

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • [Website](https://www.inceptionlrt.com/)
    • [Documentation](https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/)
    • [Github Page](https://github.com/inceptionlrt/smart-contracts)    
    • [Communities](https://discord.com/invite/RSAtmyXcSk)
    • [X (Twitter)](https://x.com/InceptionLRT)

**Protocol Description:**

> InceptionLRT is the infrastructure layer decentralizing restaking by positioning curators as the cornerstone of the ecosystem.
By addressing the complexity and fragmentation of restaking in a transparent and DAO-governed way, InceptionLRT has pioneered and advanced the concept of Multi-Curator LRTs!


**Motivation:**

> InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for inwstETHs/WETH to substantially increase the liquidity of inwstETHs, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols, namely Morpho, Compound and Gearbox.

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol’s dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.

2. **Oracles:** Rate Provider for [inwstETHs](https://etherscan.io/address/0xae48B92CBc0882a7D70D878e42cc121a62ceB632).

3. **Audits:** InceptionLRT undergoes security audits and checks to ensure the safety of user funds. Latest: [Audit Reports | InceptionLRT Docs](https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/security/audit-reports).

4. **Centralization vectors:** inwstETHs architecture involves delegations to Mellow and Symbiotic contracts.

5. **Market History:** No major volatility - [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/inception-restaked-steth-symbiotic).
 
6. **Value:** The pool is intended to be the primary source of liquidity for inwstETHs on Ethereum and allow for a healthy stimulation of volume.
Gauge: https://etherscan.io/address/0x6B8B1376F7E2A9aDA08D0B8bAcF5e0baD8B9B4ea

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-646] Enable Gauge for instETH/wstETH [Arbitrum]
raw.author: 0x7019Be4E4eB74cA5F61224FeAf687d2b43998516
raw.body:
PR With Payload
https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/1109

**Summary:**
> This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH on Arbitrum. instETH is the Restaking Token dedicated to stETH, obtained through InceptionLRT’s restaking mechanism and platform.
InceptionLRT is an omnichain liquid restaking protocol offering both Native and Isolated restaking to users.
**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website: https://www.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Documentation: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Github Page: [GitHub - inceptionlrt/smart-contracts: Smart contracts, vaults, tokens, and associated tests for the InceptionLRT project](https://github.com/inceptionlrt/smart-contracts/tree/master)
    • Communities: x.com, Discord: [InceptionLRT](https://discord.com/invite/gBswunawAn)

**Protocol Description:**

> InceptionLRT is an omnichain liquid restaking protocol offering both Native and Isolated restaking to users.
Powered by the Flash Unstake mechanism and supported by node operators with DVT Technology, InceptionLRT aims to become the most complete liquid restaking protocol in DeFi. The isolated architecture combined with the flash unstake feature solves the only drawback of isolated LRTs - liquidity fragmentation!

**Motivation:**

> InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH to substantially increase the liquidity of instETH, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols.

**Specifications:**
 
1. **Governance:** ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol’s dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.

2. **Oracles:** Rate Provider for [instETH](https://etherscan.io/address/0x57a5a0567187ff4a8dcc1a9bba86155e355878f2).

3. **Audits:** InceptionLRT undergoes security audits and checks to ensure the safety of user funds. Latest: [Audit Reports | InceptionLRT Docs](https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/security/audit-reports).

4. **Centralization vectors:** The InceptionLRT Litepaper introduced the vision for Inception as a decentralized system where independent node operators work to power the growth and development of Web3. Further detailed information may be found here: [EigenLayer - Inception iLRTs Docs](https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/introduction/eigenlayer#the-decentralization-factor-on-eigen-layer).

5. **Market History:** 1. No major volatility - [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/inception-steth).
 
6. **Value:** The pool is intended to be the primary source of liquidity for instETH on Arbitrum and allow for a healthy stimulation of volume.
Child Chain Gauge: [Vyper_contract | Address 0x2dEafe52b0bCb9801d3aaDc0D75c7879cB2E5825 | Arbiscan](https://arbiscan.io/address/0xb072496eEf1F88a2Bd1BA93F880c7ed685264EB1)
Root Gauge: [ArbitrumRootGauge | Address 0xE3A23a49128Aa55d0705E4F97ac4dc3149dFf729 | Etherscan](https://etherscan.io/address/0x82bc385C57447188de50Ba8237210cAaA43a0BB3)

### Technical Specifications:

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:`0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0x82bc385C57447188de50Ba8237210cAaA43a0BB3`

gaugeType(string): `Arbitrum`

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-605] Enable Gauge for inankrETH/ankrETH [Ethereum]
raw.author: 0x7c2eA10D3e5922ba3bBBafa39Dc0677353D2AF17
raw.body:
Payload with PR

https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/959

Summary:

This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for inankrETH/ankrETH on Ethereum. inankrETH is the Restaked Token dedicated to ankrETH, obtained through InceptionLRT’s restaking mechanism and platform.
InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST.

References/Useful links:

Link to:
• Website: https://www.inceptionlrt.com/ 1
• Documentation: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/
• Github Page: GitHub - inceptionlrt/smart-contracts: Smart contracts, vaults, tokens, and associated tests for the InceptionLRT project
• Communities: https://twitter.com/InceptionLRT, Discord: InceptionLRT

Protocol Description:

InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST.
These iLRTs can be freely traded and used in other DeFi protocols while maintaining segregation from the underlying LSTs. This architecture addresses potential risks associated with basket-based LRTs like increased complexity, counterparty risk, and often unclear pool rebalancing rules.
InceptionLRT is specifically designed to bolster the EigenLayer framework by addressing a critical challenge: the issue of liquidity locking in the protocol. This advancement positions InceptionLRT as a key player in enhancing the fluidity and accessibility of restaking in the DeFi landscape.

Motivation:

InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for inankrETH/ankrETH to substantially increase the liquidity of inankrETH, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols.

Specifications:

Governance: ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol’s dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.

Oracles: Rate Provider for inankrETH 1. Rate provider review deemed SAFE.

Audits: InceptionLRT undergoes security audits and checks to ensure the safety of user funds. Latest by Veridise: Audit

Centralization vectors: The InceptionLRT Litepaper introduced the vision for Inception as a decentralized system where independent node operators work to power the growth and development of Web3. Further detailed information may be found here: EigenLayer - Inception iLRTs Docs.

Market History: No major volatility - CoinGecko.

Value: The pool is intended to be the primary source of liquidity for inankrETH on Ethereum and allow for a healthy stimulation of volume.

Pool: Balancer

Gauge: Vyper_contract | Address 0xCC9723faDed81a9448a9664c39C0Df2e77FDfA2E | Etherscan

Specification:
The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860 will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at 0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd and call the addGauge function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): 0xCC9723faDed81a9448a9664c39C0Df2e77FDfA2E
gaugeType(string): Ethereum

choices: No, this is not the way

raw.title: [BIP-549] Enable Gauge for instETH/wstETH [Ethereum]
raw.author: 0x9f74662aD05840Ba35d111930501c617920dD68e
raw.body:
### PR with Payload

https://github.com/BalancerMaxis/multisig-ops/pull/811

**Summary:**
> This is a proposal on behalf of InceptionLRT to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH on Ethereum. instETH is the Restaked Token dedicated to stETH, obtained through InceptionLRT's restaking mechanism and platform. 
InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs with the initial focus on stETH and rETH. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST. 

**References/Useful links:**

> Link to:
    • Website: https://www.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Documentation: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/
    • Github Page: https://github.com/inceptionlrt/smart-contracts/tree/master
    • Communities: https://twitter.com/InceptionLRT, Discord: https://discord.com/invite/gBswunawAn

**Protocol Description:**

> InceptionLRT is an isolated Liquid Restaking protocol for Liquid Staking Tokens (LSTs), enabling the restaking of various LSTs with the initial focus on stETH and rETH. Its core feature is the issuance of Isolated Liquid Restaking Tokens (iLRTs) for each restaked LST. 
These iLRTs can be freely traded and used in other DeFi protocols while maintaining segregation from the underlying LSTs. This architecture addresses potential risks associated with basket-based LRTs like increased complexity, counterparty risk, and often unclear pool rebalancing rules.
InceptionLRT is specifically designed to bolster the EigenLayer framework by addressing a critical challenge: the issue of liquidity locking in the protocol. This advancement positions InceptionLRT as a key player in enhancing the fluidity and accessibility of restaking in the DeFi landscape.


**Motivation:**

> InceptionLRT aims to enable a gauge for instETH/wstETH to substantially increase the liquidity of instETH, while supporting its utility and viability for integration into a range of DeFi protocols.

**Specifications:**
 
>1. **Governance:** ING holders participate in decision-making, influencing the protocol’s direction and policies, including the Node Operators, AVSs and restaking strategies.
Incentive Allocation: Through gauge weight voting, veING holders direct incentives and rewards towards preferred liquidity, impacting the protocol's dynamics.
Rewards and Participation: Providing ING to liquidity pools like the 80-20 Balancer Liquidity Pools and locking the LP token earns veING, granting access to various protocol.
>2. **Oracles:** Rate Provider for [instETH](https://etherscan.io/address/0x343281bb5029c4b698fe736d800115ac64d5de39#readContract).
>3. **Audits:** InceptionLRT undergoes security audits and checks to ensure the safety of user funds. Latest by Veridise: [Audit](https://549839982-files.gitbook.io/~/files/v0/b/gitbook-x-prod.appspot.com/o/spaces%2FH5cQR703CA1JD1dlB1kD%2Fuploads%2Fnb7LLR0qt6qsNbvhex8f%2Fveridise-inceptionlrt-12-jan-2024.pdf?alt=media&token=d08d44bc-6bc6-409a-886b-294599a96e12)
>4. **Centralization vectors:** The InceptionLRT Litepaper introduced the vision for Inception as a decentralized system where independent node operators work to power the growth and development of Web3. Further detailed information may be found here: https://docs.inceptionlrt.com/introduction/eigenlayer#the-decentralization-factor-on-eigen-layer.
>5. **Market History:** No major volatility - [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/inception-restaked-steth).
 >6. **Value:**  The pool is intended to be the primary source of liquidity for instETH on Ethereum and allow for a healthy stimulation of volume.

Pool: [0xe3e0022d25194431a98e8bf5034d2617c96e1d44](https://app.balancer.fi/#/ethereum/pool/0xe3e0022d25194431a98e8bf5034d2617c96e1d44000000000000000000000670) 
Gauge: [0xCDA1B6704B108dF230d2a36da4C088C6afd6f335](https://etherscan.io/address/0xCDA1B6704B108dF230d2a36da4C088C6afd6f335)

Transaction: The Balancer Maxi LM Multisig `eth:0xc38c5f97B34E175FFd35407fc91a937300E33860` will interact with the GaugeAdderv4 at `0x5DbAd78818D4c8958EfF2d5b95b28385A22113Cd` and call the `addGauge` function with the following arguments:

gauge(address): `0xCDA1B6704B108dF230d2a36da4C088C6afd6f335`

gaugeType(string): `Ethereum`

choices: No, this is not the way

decision.summary: This proposal enables a gauge for inwstETHs/wstETH on Ethereum, aiming to increase liquidity and support integration into major DeFi protocols. The voting timeline and power distribution strongly favor approval. A similar past proposal had a positive outcome without negative market impact. Forum discussion is neutral, showing no opposition or strong support, aligning with the recommendation.
key_arguments_for: Proposal enables increased liquidity for inwstETHs through gauge integration.
Supports utility and viability for integration into multiple DeFi protocols.
Timeline voting metrics show stable and concentrated voting power supporting approval.
Similar past proposal had positive outcome and no adverse market effects.
key_arguments_against: No significant negative sentiment or opposition in forum discussion.
No early votes indicating hesitation or abstention.

evidence.quote: Forum comments neutral; no positive or negative sentiment expressed.
Lead ratio and vote stability strongly favor 'Yes, let's do it'.
Similar proposal passed with positive market response and no negative price or TVL impact.

available_choices: No, this is not the way
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Yes, let's do it' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
- The voting timeline and power distribution metrics show strong, stable support for enabling the gauge.
- The forum discussion is neutral, showing no opposition, so the recommendation aligns with community sentiment.
- A similar past proposal with high similarity passed successfully and did not cause negative market or TVL impact.
- Market indicators show positive price and TVL impact, supporting the proposal's value proposition.
Thus, the recommendation is to approve the proposal to benefit the protocol's liquidity and integration prospects.
